summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of North 63rd Street and North 64th Street, each from Phinney Avenue to Linden Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenance; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8566 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
